e: ￹`Pa~`carcar~`ho~ `ko~ `harateng~ `ako~ `anini~.￺I am in a state of flux in my thinking.￻我臨時思潮汹湧
d.f: ￹￺to be in a temporary state￻居於暫時狀態中

e: ￹`O~ `mi~`pacarcar~`ay~ `kako~ `a~ `maro'~ `itini~.￺I am staying here temporarily.￻我暫時在這裡逗留
￹`Pa~`carcar~`ho~ `kako~ `a~ `ma~`foti'~.￺I am going to sleep a few minutes.￻我暫時睡一下(一會兒)
